title: Matplotlib Stacked Bar Chart
description: In this lab, we will learn how to create a stacked bar chart using the Matplotlib library in Python. We will use penguin data to create a stacked bar chart that shows the number of penguins with above average body mass.

meta.title: Create Stacked Bar Charts with Matplotlib
meta.description: Learn how to create stacked bar charts using Matplotlib in Python, with a focus on penguin data analysis.
meta.keywords: Matplotlib, Python, data visualization, stacked bar chart, penguin data
